front.title: PCEP Extensions for LSP scheduling with stateful PCE

abstract.t: This document defines a set of extensions needed to the stateful Path Computation Element (PCE) communication Protocol (PCEP), so as to enable Labeled Switched Path (LSP) path computation, activation, setup and deletion based on scheduled time intervals for the LSP and the actual network resource usage in a centralized network environment as stated in RFC 8413.
